name: Eanoc, Sentry of the Ghoti
effectText: If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can target 1 of your banished Level 4 or lower Fish monsters; Special Summon it in Defense Position, but negate its effects. You can banish 1 Fish monster from your hand or face-up field; add 1 "Ghoti" Trap from your Deck to your hand. You can only use each effect of "Eanoc, Sentry of the Ghoti" once per turn.
